summary: Merliah, the surf girl and enchanting mermaid princess, gets her ticket to success for the ultimate surfing tournament; however, when her magic necklace gets stolen, Aquellia will be in danger. Will she believe in herself to save the day?
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Ashleigh Ball|Kathleen Barr|Nicole Oliver|Nakia Burrise|Maryke Hendrikse|Garry Chalk|Tabitha St. Germain|Alistair Abell|Jonathan Holmes|Kelly Metzger|Andrew Francis|Barbara Tyson|Kira Tozer|Bethany Brown|Britt Irvin|Peter Mel|Jennifer Cameron
title: Barbie en Una aventura de sirenas 2
